import React from "react"; import Grid from "@material-ui/core/Grid"; import Typography from "@material-ui/core/Typography"; import Input from "@material-ui/core/Input"; import Table from "@material-ui/core/Table"; import { TableHead, TableRow, TableCell } from "@material-ui/core"; import LocalPizzaSharpIcon from "@material-ui/icons/LocalPizzaSharp"; import AddCircleIcon from "@material-ui/icons/AddCircle"; import RemoveCircleSharpIcon from "@material-ui/icons/RemoveCircleSharp"; import PersonIcon from "@material-ui/icons/Person"; import AccessibilityNewIcon from "@material-ui/icons/AccessibilityNew"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { buyCake } from "./redux"; import { addCake } from "./redux"; import { buyMediumPizza } from "./redux"; import { addMediumPizza } from "./redux"; const PizzaOrder = (props) => { return (

); }; const mapStateToProps = state => { return { numOfCakes: state.cake.numOfCakes, numOfMediumPizzas: state.mediumPizza.numOfMediumPizzas } } const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => { return { buyCake: () => dispatch(buyCake()), addCake: () => dispatch(addCake()), buyMediumPizza: () => dispatch(buyMediumPizza()), addCake: () => dispatch(addCake()) } } export default connect( mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps )(PizzaOrder)
